All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddProductSrv
Servlet implementation class AddProductSrv This servlet handles the addition of new products by an admin.
AddtoCart
Servlet implementation class AddtoCart
CartBean
A JavaBean representing an item in a user's shopping cart.
CartService
Service interface for managing shopping cart operations.
CartServiceImpl
Implementation of the CartService interface.
DBUtil
A utility class for managing database connections.
DemandBean
A JavaBean representing a user's demand for an out-of-stock product.
DemandService
Service interface for managing product demand (for out-of-stock items).
DemandServiceImpl
Implementation of the DemandService interface.
FansMessage
Servlet implementation class FansMessage This servlet handles messages submitted by users through a contact/feedback form.
IDUtil
Utility class for generating unique IDs based on timestamps.
IUserConstants
Interface containing constants related to the user table and its columns in the database.
JavaMailUtil
Utility class for sending emails using the Jakarta Mail API.
LoginSrv
Servlet implementation class LoginSrv This servlet handles user login for both customers and admins.
LogoutSrv
Servlet implementation class LogoutSrv This servlet handles the user logout process.
MailMessage
A utility class for sending pre-formatted emails for various application events.
OrderBean
A JavaBean representing a single item within an order.
OrderDetails
A JavaBean representing the detailed view of an ordered item.
OrderService
Service interface for managing order and transaction operations.
OrderServiceImpl
Implementation of the OrderService interface.
OrderServlet
Servlet implementation class OrderServlet This servlet processes the final order after a successful payment.
ProductBean
A JavaBean representing a product in the shopping system.
ProductService
Service interface for managing product-related operations.
ProductServiceImpl
Implementation of the ProductService interface.
RegisterSrv
Servlet implementation class RegisterSrv This servlet handles new user registration.
RemoveProductSrv
Servlet implementation class RemoveProductSrv This servlet handles the removal of a product by an admin.
ShipmentServlet
Servlet implementation class ShipmentServlet This servlet handles the action of marking an order item as shipped.
ShowImage
Servlet implementation class ShowImage This servlet retrieves and displays a product image from the database.
TestMail
A utility class with a main method to test email sending functionality.
TransactionBean
A JavaBean representing a financial transaction.
TransService
Service interface for managing transaction-related operations.
TransServiceImpl
Implementation of the TransService interface.
UpdateProductSrv
Servlet implementation class UpdateProductSrv This servlet handles updating a product's details (without updating the image).
UpdateToCart
Servlet implementation class UpdateToCart This servlet handles updating the quantity of a product in the user's cart.
UserBean
A JavaBean representing a user in the shopping system.
UserService
Service interface for managing user-related operations.
UserServiceImpl
Implementation of the UserService interface.
